ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] New Book: RESTful .Net
ygData.msgSnippet: As the author - I can say the book is meant to be for a developer on the Microsoft Platform who wants to learn how to use WCF to build RESTful-type services.

As the author - I can say the book is meant to be for a developer on
the Microsoft Platform who wants to learn how to use WCF to build
RESTful-type services.

Not too much REST discussion- for that I point people towards the
Richardson/Ruby book.

On Fri, Dec 5, 2008 at 7:30 AM, Nick Gall <nick.gall@...> wrote:
> Looks interesting: http://oreilly.com/catalog/9780596519209/ .
> Via http://www.pluralsight.com/community/blogs/aaron/archive/2008/12/02/restful-net.aspx
> .
>
> Re the discussion of REST for beginners and the lack of good introductory
> material for enterprise use of REST, this may help.
> -- Nick
